statements: SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Inventory WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 20.00 AND 100.00;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, price FROM Inventory ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY price DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT quantity, price, product_name FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY quantity ASC, price DESC;
